titleStmt.title: A briefe discourse of the late murther of master George Saunders, a worshipfull citizen of London and of the apprehension, arreignement, and execution of the principall and accessaries of the same.
titleStmt.author: Golding, Arthur, 1536-1606.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Henry Bynneman, dvvelling in Knightriders streete, at the signe of the Mermayde,

notesStmt.note: For a play based on this event, see STC 25089--Cf. STC.
Imperfect; as filmed, much of text too light to read.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Knightriders streete, at the signe of the Mermayde
